00001 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00002 //Description: 1. Setup Cdc geometry and manage associated sensitive detectors
00003 //             2. Communicate with associated sensitive detectors
00004 //Author: Wu Chen(wuchen@mail.ihep.ac.cn)
00005 //Created: 21 Oct, 2012
00006 //Modified: 6 Nov, 2012 by Wu Chen(wuchen@mail.ihep.ac.cn)
00007 //Modified: 7 Jan, 2013 by Wu Chen(wuchen@mail.ihep.ac.cn)
00008 //          Added Boolean Volumes
00009 //Comment: about fVerboseLevel:
00010 //         or modifying input card before starting a run.
00011 //         Either way would set verbose of selected sensitive detectors to the same level
00012 //         0:   Only Warnings and Errors
00013 //         1:   Important information
00014 //         >=5: All information
00015 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------//

00037 
00038 CdcGeometrySvc::CdcGeometrySvc(G4String name, G4String opt )
00039         : SimpleGeometrySvc(name, "S") // Use a not-empty opt to stop inherited class from creating new GeometryParameter
00040 {
00041         if ( opt == "" ){//called directly by user. set up parameter class.
00042                 CdcGeometryParameter *pointer = new CdcGeometryParameter(name);
00043                 //              std::cout<<"======>In CdcGeometrySvc, new CdcGeometryParameter at ("<<(void*)pointer<<")!"<<std::endl;
00044                 set_GeometryParameter(pointer);
00045         }
00046 }
00047 
00048 CdcGeometrySvc::~CdcGeometrySvc(){
00049         printf("~CdcGeometrySvc");
00050 }
00051 
00052 //------------------------Modify-------------------------------
00053 void CdcGeometrySvc::set_GeometryParameter( CdcGeometryParameter* val ){
00054         m_GeometryParameter = val;
00055         SimpleGeometrySvc::set_GeometryParameter(m_GeometryParameter);
00056 }
00057 
00058 //---------------------------SetGeometry---------------------------------
00059 //
00060 G4VPhysicalVolume* CdcGeometrySvc::SetGeometry(){
00061         m_GeometryParameter->Dump();
00062         ConstructVolumes();
00063         G4VPhysicalVolume *current = PlaceVolumes();
00064         return current;
00065 }
00066 
00067 //-------------------------Special functions-----------------------------
00068 //=> ConstructVolumes
00069 void CdcGeometrySvc::ConstructVolumes(){
00070         SimpleGeometrySvc::ConstructVolumes();
00071         bool vis;
00072         double r, g, b;
00073 
00074         //*******************Construct Cells and wires***********************
00075         //get general info
00076         bool checkOverlap = m_GeometryParameter->get_checkoverlap();
00077         G4String MVol_name = m_GeometryParameter->get_MotherLogicalVolume();
00078         G4String SD_name = m_GeometryParameter->get_SensitiveDetector();
00079         G4String SDVolumeName = m_GeometryParameter->get_SDVolumeName();
00080         G4String CellMatName=m_GeometryParameter->get_CellMaterial();
00081         //get wire info
00082         G4double signalWireR=m_GeometryParameter->get_SignalWireRadius();
00083         G4double fieldWireR=m_GeometryParameter->get_FieldWireRadius();
00084         G4String signalWireMatName=m_GeometryParameter->get_SignalWireMaterial();
00085         G4String fieldWireMatName=m_GeometryParameter->get_FieldWireMaterial();
00086         G4Material *SignalWireMat, *FieldWireMat, *CellMat;
00087         SignalWireMat = G4Material::GetMaterial(signalWireMatName);
00088         FieldWireMat = G4Material::GetMaterial(fieldWireMatName);
00089         CellMat = G4Material::GetMaterial(CellMatName);
00090         if (!SignalWireMat || !FieldWireMat || !CellMat ){
00091                 std::cout<<"In CdcGeometrySvc, Material is not defined!"<<std::endl;
00092                 G4Exception("CdcGeometrySvc::SetGeometry()",
00093                                 "InvalidSetup", FatalException,
00094                                 "unknown material name");
00095         }
00096 
00097         //loop in layers
00098         G4int    layerNo = m_GeometryParameter->get_LayerNo();      
00099         //      for( int layerId = 0; layerId < 1; layerId++ ){
00100         for( int layerId = 0; layerId < layerNo; layerId++ ){
00101                 //set useful variables
00102                 G4LogicalVolume* log_cell;// would be used as the mother volume of wires
00103                 G4LogicalVolume* log_FieldWire_in;
00104                 G4LogicalVolume* log_FieldWire_mid;
00105                 G4LogicalVolume* log_FieldWire_out;
00106                 G4LogicalVolume* log_SignalWire;
00107                 std::ostringstream osname;
00108                 osname<<"CdcCellofLayer"<<layerId;
00109                 G4String CellName = osname.str();
00110                 osname.str("");
00111                 osname.clear();
00112                 osname<<"CdcSignalWireofLayer"<<layerId;
00113                 G4String SignalWireName = osname.str();
00114                 osname.str("");
00115                 osname.clear();
00116                 osname<<"CdcFieldWireofLayer"<<layerId;
00117                 G4String FieldWireName = osname.str();
00118                 G4double outR, innerR, halfzlen;
00119                 G4double startAngle, spanAngle;
00120                 //get layer info
00121                 G4double cell_dphi = m_GeometryParameter->get_layer_cell_dphi(layerId);
00122                 G4double twisteddangle = m_GeometryParameter->get_layer_angle4rotate(layerId);
00123                 G4double RMin = m_GeometryParameter->get_layer_RMin(layerId);
00124                 G4double RMid = m_GeometryParameter->get_layer_RMid(layerId);
00125                 G4double RMax = layerId == layerNo - 1 ? m_GeometryParameter->get_Cdc_RMax() : m_GeometryParameter->get_layer_RMin(layerId+1);
00126                 G4double layer_halfzlen = m_GeometryParameter->get_layer_length(layerId)/2.; //In Geant4, soild has central-symmetry 
00127                 G4int layer_type = m_GeometryParameter->get_layer_type(layerId);
00128                 G4double alpha_RMin;
00129                 G4double alpha_RMax;
00130                 G4double alpha_RMid = twisteddangle/2;
00131                 if ( layer_type == 2 ){
00132                         alpha_RMin = twisteddangle/4;
00133                 }
00134                 else if ( layer_type == 4 ){
00135                         alpha_RMin = m_GeometryParameter->get_layer_angle4rotate(layerId-1)/4;
00136                 }
00137                 else{
00138                         alpha_RMin = twisteddangle/2;
00139                 }
00140                 if ( layer_type == 3 ){
00141                         alpha_RMax = m_GeometryParameter->get_layer_angle4rotate(layerId+1)/4;
00142                 }
00143                 else if (layer_type == 5 ){
00144                         alpha_RMax = twisteddangle/4;
00145                 }
00146                 else{
00147                         alpha_RMax = twisteddangle/2;
00148                 }
00149                 G4double theta_RMin = atan(RMin*sin(alpha_RMin)/layer_halfzlen);
00150                 G4double theta_RMax = atan(RMax*sin(alpha_RMax)/layer_halfzlen);
00151                 G4double theta_RMid = atan(RMid*sin(alpha_RMid)/layer_halfzlen);
00152                 //    std::cout<<"twisteddangle = "<<twisteddangle/deg<<std::endl;
00153                 //    std::cout<<"alpha_RMin = "<<alpha_RMin/deg<<std::endl;
00154                 //    std::cout<<"alpha_RMid = "<<alpha_RMid/deg<<std::endl;
00155                 //    std::cout<<"alpha_RMax = "<<alpha_RMax/deg<<std::endl;
00156                 //    std::cout<<"theta_RMin = "<<theta_RMin/deg<<std::endl;
00157                 //    std::cout<<"theta_RMid = "<<theta_RMid/deg<<std::endl;
00158                 //    std::cout<<"theta_RMax = "<<theta_RMax/deg<<std::endl;
00159                 //====>Get logical volumes for SignalWire and FieldWire of this layer
00160                 //SignalWire
00161                 startAngle=0.*deg;
00162                 spanAngle=360.*deg;
00163                 outR=signalWireR;
00164                 innerR = 0.;
00165                 halfzlen = layer_halfzlen;
00166                 double halfzlen_sw = layer_halfzlen/cos(theta_RMid) - 2*signalWireR*tan(theta_RMid);
00167                 if ( get_VerboseLevel() >=10 ){
00168                         std::cout<<"sol_SignalWire: innerR = "<<innerR/mm
00169                                 <<"mm, outR = "<<outR/mm
00170                                 <<"mm, halfzlen = "<<halfzlen_sw/mm
00171                                 <<"mm, startAngle = "<<startAngle/rad
00172                                 <<"rad, spanAngle = "<<spanAngle/rad
00173                                 <<"rad"
00174                                 <<std::endl;
00175                 }
00176                 G4Tubs* sol_SignalWire=new G4Tubs(SignalWireName,innerR,outR,halfzlen_sw,startAngle,spanAngle);
00177                 log_SignalWire = new G4LogicalVolume(sol_SignalWire, SignalWireMat,SignalWireName,0,0,0);
00178                 //FieldWire
00179                 outR=fieldWireR;
00180                 //  FieldWire i_row == 1
00181                 double halfzlen_fw_mid = layer_halfzlen/cos(theta_RMid) - 2*fieldWireR*tan(theta_RMid);
00182                 if ( get_VerboseLevel() >=10 ){
00183                         std::cout<<"sol_FieldWire_mid: innerR = "<<innerR/mm
00184                                 <<"mm, outR = "<<outR/mm
00185                                 <<"mm, halfzlen = "<<halfzlen_fw_mid/mm
00186                                 <<"mm, startAngle = "<<startAngle/rad
00187                                 <<"rad, spanAngle = "<<spanAngle/rad
00188                                 <<"rad"
00189                                 <<std::endl;
00190                 }
00191                 G4Tubs* sol_FieldWire_mid =new G4Tubs(FieldWireName,innerR,outR,halfzlen_fw_mid,startAngle,spanAngle);
00192                 log_FieldWire_mid = new G4LogicalVolume(sol_FieldWire_mid, FieldWireMat,FieldWireName,0,0,0);
00193                 //  FieldWire i_row == 0
00194                 double halfzlen_fw_in = layer_halfzlen/cos(theta_RMin) - 2*fieldWireR*tan(theta_RMin);
00195                 if ( get_VerboseLevel() >=10 ){
00196                         std::cout<<"sol_FieldWire_in: innerR = "<<innerR/mm
00197                                 <<"mm, outR = "<<outR/mm
00198                                 <<"mm, halfzlen = "<<halfzlen_fw_in/mm
00199                                 <<"mm, startAngle = "<<startAngle/rad
00200                                 <<"rad, spanAngle = "<<spanAngle/rad
00201                                 <<"rad"
00202                                 <<std::endl;
00203                 }
00204                 G4Tubs* sol_FieldWire_in =new G4Tubs(FieldWireName,innerR,outR,halfzlen_fw_in,startAngle,spanAngle);
00205                 log_FieldWire_in = new G4LogicalVolume(sol_FieldWire_in, FieldWireMat,FieldWireName,0,0,0);
00206                 //  FieldWire i_row == 2
00207                 if ( layer_type == 1 ){
00208                         double halfzlen_fw_out = layer_halfzlen/cos(theta_RMax) - 2*fieldWireR*tan(theta_RMax);
00209                         if ( get_VerboseLevel() >=10 ){
00210                                 std::cout<<"sol_FieldWire_out: innerR = "<<innerR/mm
00211                                         <<"mm, outR = "<<outR/mm
00212                                         <<"mm, halfzlen = "<<halfzlen_fw_out/mm
00213                                         <<"mm, startAngle = "<<startAngle/rad
00214                                         <<"rad, spanAngle = "<<spanAngle/rad
00215                                         <<"rad"
00216                                         <<std::endl;
00217                         }
00218                         G4Tubs* sol_FieldWire_out =new G4Tubs(FieldWireName,innerR,outR,halfzlen_fw_out,startAngle,spanAngle);
00219                         log_FieldWire_out = new G4LogicalVolume(sol_FieldWire_out, FieldWireMat,FieldWireName,0,0,0);
00220                 }
00221                 else{
00222                         log_FieldWire_out = log_FieldWire_mid;
00223                 }
00224                 //visual option
00225                 vis = m_GeometryParameter->get_vis_SignalWire();
00226                 if (!vis){
00227                         log_SignalWire->SetVisAttributes(G4VisAttributes::Invisible);
00228                 }
00229                 else{
00230                         r = m_GeometryParameter->get_r_SignalWire();
00231                         g = m_GeometryParameter->get_g_SignalWire();
00232                         b = m_GeometryParameter->get_b_SignalWire();
00233                         G4VisAttributes* visAttributes = new G4VisAttributes;
00234                         visAttributes->SetVisibility(true);
00235                         visAttributes->SetColour(r,g,b);
00236                         log_SignalWire->SetVisAttributes(visAttributes);
00237                 }
00238                 vis = m_GeometryParameter->get_vis_FieldWire();
00239                 if (!vis){
00240                         log_FieldWire_in->SetVisAttributes(G4VisAttributes::Invisible);
00241                         log_FieldWire_mid->SetVisAttributes(G4VisAttributes::Invisible);
00242                         log_FieldWire_out->SetVisAttributes(G4VisAttributes::Invisible);
00243                 }
00244                 else{
00245                         r = m_GeometryParameter->get_r_FieldWire();
00246                         g = m_GeometryParameter->get_g_FieldWire();
00247                         b = m_GeometryParameter->get_b_FieldWire();
00248                         G4VisAttributes* visAttributes = new G4VisAttributes;
00249                         visAttributes->SetVisibility(true);
00250                         visAttributes->SetColour(r,g,b);
00251                         log_FieldWire_in->SetVisAttributes(visAttributes);
00252                         log_FieldWire_mid->SetVisAttributes(visAttributes);
00253                         log_FieldWire_out->SetVisAttributes(visAttributes);
00254                 }
00255                 //====>Get logical volume for Cell of this layer
00256                 //TYPE 0/1: Ordinary layer/
00257                 //          Out most layer
00258                 //    each cell is a twisted(or not) tube
00259                 //TYPE 2/3/4/5: Stereo layer upon an axial layer/
00260                 //              Axial layer beneath a stereo layer/
00261                 //              Axial layer upon a stereo layer/
00262                 //              Stereo layer beneath an axial layer/
00263                 //    each cell is a G4TwistedTube subtracted by a G4Hype
00264                 G4double dr_RMin = alpha_RMin > theta_RMin ? fieldWireR/cos(alpha_RMin) : fieldWireR/cos(theta_RMin);
00265                 G4double dr_RMax = alpha_RMax > theta_RMax ? fieldWireR/cos(alpha_RMax) : fieldWireR/cos(theta_RMax);
00266                 G4double endinnerrad;
00267                 G4double endouterrad;
00268                 if ( layer_type == 4 ){
00269                         endinnerrad = (RMin + dr_RMin)*cos(alpha_RMin);
00270                         //std::cout<<"endinnerrad = ("<<RMin/mm<<" - "<<dr_RMin/mm<<")*cos("<<alpha_RMin<<") = "<<endinnerrad/mm<<std::endl;
00271                 }
00272                 else if ( layer_type == 2 ){
00273                         endinnerrad = RMin + dr_RMin;
00274                 }
00275                 else {
00276                         endinnerrad = RMin - dr_RMin;
00277                 }
00278                 if ( layer_type == 5 ){
00279                         endouterrad = (RMax - dr_RMax)*cos(alpha_RMax)/cos(alpha_RMid);
00280                         //std::cout<<"endouterrad = ("<<RMax/mm<<" - "<<dr_RMax/mm<<")*cos("<<alpha_RMax<<")/cos("<<alpha_RMid/rad<<") = "<<endouterrad/mm<<std::endl;
00281                 }
00282                 else if ( layer_type == 1 ){
00283                         endouterrad = RMax + dr_RMax;
00284                 }
00285                 else{
00286                         endouterrad = RMax - dr_RMax;
00287                 }
00288                 if ( get_VerboseLevel() >=10 ){
00289                         std::cout<<"sol_cell: twisteddangle = "<<twisteddangle/rad
00290                                 <<"rad, endinnerrad = "<<endinnerrad/mm
00291                                 <<"mm, endouterrad = "<<endouterrad/mm
00292                                 <<"mm, halfzlen = "<<halfzlen/mm
00293                                 <<"mm, dphi = "<<cell_dphi/rad
00294                                 <<"rad"
00295                                 <<std::endl;
00296                 }
00297                 G4TwistedTubs* sol_cell = new G4TwistedTubs(CellName, twisteddangle, endinnerrad, endouterrad, halfzlen, cell_dphi);
00298                 G4double twistedangle4subt;
00299                 G4double endinnerrad4subt;
00300                 G4double endouterrad4subt;
00301                 if ( layer_type == 5 ){
00302                         twistedangle4subt = alpha_RMax*2;
00303                         endinnerrad4subt = (RMax - dr_RMax);
00304                         endouterrad4subt = endouterrad;
00305                 }
00306                 else if ( layer_type == 4 ){
00307                         twistedangle4subt = alpha_RMin*2;
00308                         endinnerrad4subt = endinnerrad;
00309                         endouterrad4subt = (RMin + dr_RMin);
00310                 }
00311                 else if ( layer_type == 3 ){
00312                         twistedangle4subt = alpha_RMax*2;
00313                         endinnerrad4subt = endouterrad;
00314                         endouterrad4subt = (RMax - dr_RMax)/cos(alpha_RMax);
00315                 }
00316                 else if ( layer_type == 2 ){
00317                         twistedangle4subt = alpha_RMin*2;
00318                         endinnerrad4subt = (RMin + dr_RMin)*cos(alpha_RMid)/cos(alpha_RMin);
00319                         endouterrad4subt = endinnerrad;
00320                 }
00321 
00322                 if ( layer_type != 0 && layer_type != 1 ){
00323                         if ( get_VerboseLevel() >=10 ){
00324                                 std::cout<<"sol_Subtraction4Cell: twisteddangle = "<<twistedangle4subt/rad
00325                                         <<"rad, endinnerrad = "<<endinnerrad4subt/mm
00326                                         <<"mm, endouterrad = "<<endouterrad4subt/mm
00327                                         <<"mm, halfzlen = "<<halfzlen/mm
00328                                         <<std::endl;
00329                         }
00330                         G4TwistedTubs* sol_Subtraction4Cell = new G4TwistedTubs("Subtraction4Cell", twistedangle4subt, endinnerrad4subt, endouterrad4subt, halfzlen, 180*deg );
00331                         G4SubtractionSolid* sol_SubtractedCell = new G4SubtractionSolid(CellName,sol_cell,sol_Subtraction4Cell);
00332                         //log_cell = new G4LogicalVolume(sol_cell, CellMat, CellName,0,0,0);
00333                         //log_cell = new G4LogicalVolume(sol_Subtraction4Cell, CellMat, CellName,0,0,0);
00334                         log_cell = new G4LogicalVolume(sol_SubtractedCell, CellMat, CellName,0,0,0);
00335                 }
00336                 else{
00337                         log_cell = new G4LogicalVolume(sol_cell, CellMat, CellName,0,0,0);
00338                 }
00339                 G4VSensitiveDetector* aSD = MyDetectorManager::GetMyDetectorManager()->GetSD(SDVolumeName, SD_name, const_cast<CdcGeometrySvc*>(this) );
00340                 log_cell->SetSensitiveDetector( aSD );
00341                 //visual option
00342                 vis = m_GeometryParameter->get_vis_cell();
00343                 if (!vis){
00344                         log_cell->SetVisAttributes(G4VisAttributes::Invisible);
00345                 }
00346                 else{
00347                         r = m_GeometryParameter->get_r_cell();
00348                         g = m_GeometryParameter->get_g_cell();
00349                         b = m_GeometryParameter->get_b_cell();
00350                         G4VisAttributes* visAttributes = new G4VisAttributes;
00351                         visAttributes->SetVisibility(true);
00352                         visAttributes->SetColour(r,g,b);
00353                         log_cell->SetVisAttributes(visAttributes);
00354                 }
00355 
00356                 //====>place wires into cell or cdc container w.r.t different layer types
00357                 //TYPE 0: Ordinary layer
00358                 //        __________ each cell is a twisted(or not) tube with 
00359                 //        |        | 3 field wires and 1 signal wire inside
00360                 //        |o0  x   |
00361                 //        |        |
00362                 //        |o1  o2  |
00363                 //        ----------
00364                 //TYPE 1: Out most layer
00365                 //        __________ each cell is a twisted(or not) tube with 
00366                 //        |o3  o4  | 5 field wires and 1 signal wire inside
00367                 //        |        |
00368                 //        |o0  x   |
00369                 //        |        |
00370                 //        |o1  o2  |
00371                 //        ----------
00372                 //TYPE 2/3/4/5: Stereo layer upon an axial layer/
00373                 //              Axial layer beneath a stereo layer/
00374                 //              Axial layer upon a stereo layer/
00375                 //              Stereo layer beneath an axial layer/
00376                 //        __________ each cell is a G4TwistedTube subtracted by a G4Hype
00377                 //        |        | with 3 field wire and 1 signal wire inside
00378                 //        |o0  x   | for TYPE 2/4, the innerward two field wires
00379                 //        |        | have the rotate angle as half as the stereo layer
00380                 //        |o1  o2  | 
00381                 //        ---------- 
00382                 G4double RelPhi, wire_pos_R;
00383                 G4ThreeVector centerVec(1.,1.,1.);
00384                 G4double theta;
00385                 G4double wireR2Phi;
00386                 wireR2Phi = asin( fieldWireR/cos(theta_RMin)/(RMin*cos(alpha_RMid)) );//in z section, wire looks like an ellipse
00387                 for ( int i_row = 0; i_row < 2; i_row++ ){//0, inner; 1, middle
00388                         if ( i_row == 0 && ( layer_type == 4 || layer_type == 2 ) ){
00389                                 continue;
00390                         }
00391                         for ( int i_line = 0; i_line < 2; i_line++ ){//0, left; 1, right
00392                                 G4LogicalVolume* log_wire;
00393                                 G4LogicalVolume* log_mother;
00394                                 G4String name;
00395                                 log_mother = log_cell;
00396                                 if ( i_row == 1 ){
00397                                         if ( i_line == 1 ){
00398                                                 log_wire = log_SignalWire;
00399                                                 name = SignalWireName;
00400                                         }
00401                                         else{
00402                                                 log_wire = log_FieldWire_mid;
00403                                                 name = FieldWireName;
00404                                         }
00405                                 }
00406                                 else{
00407                                         log_wire = log_FieldWire_in;
00408                                         name = FieldWireName;
00409                                 }
00410                                 if ( i_row == 0 ){
00411                                         wire_pos_R = RMin*cos(alpha_RMid);
00412                                         theta = theta_RMin;
00413                                 }
00414                                 else{
00415                                         wire_pos_R = RMid*cos(alpha_RMid);
00416                                         theta = theta_RMid;
00417                                 }
00418                                 if ( i_line == 0 ) RelPhi = wireR2Phi - cell_dphi/2;
00419                                 else RelPhi = wireR2Phi;
00420                                 G4RotationMatrix* rotateMatrix=new G4RotationMatrix();
00421                                 rotateMatrix->rotateZ(-RelPhi);
00422                                 rotateMatrix->rotateX(theta);   
00423                                 centerVec.setMag(wire_pos_R);
00424                                 centerVec.setTheta(pi/2);
00425                                 centerVec.setPhi(RelPhi);
00426                                 if ( get_VerboseLevel() >=10 ){
00427                                         std::cout<<"Placing ("<<i_row<<", "<<i_line<<"): rotateZ("<<-RelPhi/deg<<"deg), rotateX("<<-theta/deg<<"deg), R = "<<centerVec.mag()/mm<<"mm"<<std::endl;
00428                                 }
00429                                 new G4PVPlacement(rotateMatrix,centerVec,log_wire,name,log_mother,false,0,checkOverlap);
00430                         }
00431                 }
00432                 if ( layer_type == 1 ){
00433                         for ( int i_line = 0; i_line < 2; i_line++ ){//0, left; 1, right
00434                                 G4LogicalVolume* log_wire;
00435                                 G4LogicalVolume* log_mother;
00436                                 G4String name;
00437                                 log_wire = log_FieldWire_out;
00438                                 name = FieldWireName;
00439                                 log_mother = log_cell;
00440                                 wire_pos_R = m_GeometryParameter->get_Cdc_RMax()*cos(alpha_RMid);
00441                                 theta = theta_RMax;
00442                                 if ( i_line == 0 ) RelPhi = wireR2Phi - cell_dphi/2;
00443                                 else RelPhi = wireR2Phi;
00444                                 G4RotationMatrix* rotateMatrix=new G4RotationMatrix();
00445                                 rotateMatrix->rotateZ(-RelPhi); 
00446                                 rotateMatrix->rotateX(theta);
00447                                 centerVec.setMag(wire_pos_R);
00448                                 centerVec.setTheta(pi/2);
00449                                 centerVec.setPhi(RelPhi);
00450                                 if ( get_VerboseLevel() >=10 ){
00451                                         std::cout<<"Placing (2, "<<i_line<<"): rotateZ("<<-RelPhi/deg<<"deg), rotaeX("<<-theta/deg<<"deg), R = "<<centerVec.mag()/mm<<"mm"<<std::endl;
00452                                 }
00453                                 new G4PVPlacement(rotateMatrix,centerVec,log_wire,name,log_mother,false,0,checkOverlap);
00454                         }
00455                 }
00456 
00457                 //====>Place cells in this layer
00458                 //  together with wires that belong to Cdc container
00459                 G4LogicalVolume* log_CdcContainer = get_logicalVolume(MVol_name);
00460                 int cellNo = m_GeometryParameter->get_layer_cell_num(layerId);
00461                 //              for ( int cellId = 0; cellId < 1; cellId++ ){
00462                 for ( int cellId = 0; cellId < cellNo; cellId++ ){
00463                         //place cell
00464                         G4double SPhi = m_GeometryParameter->get_layer_cell_phi(layerId,cellId);
00465                         G4double phi = SPhi - wireR2Phi;
00466                         G4RotationMatrix* rotateMatrix=new G4RotationMatrix();
00467                         rotateMatrix->rotateZ(-phi);
00468                         int ReplicaNo = m_GeometryParameter->get_ReplicaNo( layerId, cellId );
00469                         if ( get_VerboseLevel() >=10 ){
00470                                 std::cout<<"Placing cell: phi = "<<phi/deg<<"deg"<<std::endl;
00471                         }
00472                         new G4PVPlacement(rotateMatrix,G4ThreeVector(0.,0.,0.),log_cell,CellName,log_CdcContainer,false,ReplicaNo,checkOverlap);
00473                         if ( layer_type == 2 || layer_type == 4 ){
00474                                 for ( int i_line = 0; i_line < 2; i_line++ ){//0, left; 1, right
00475                                         G4LogicalVolume* log_wire;
00476                                         G4LogicalVolume* log_mother;
00477                                         G4String name;
00478                                         log_wire = log_FieldWire_in;
00479                                         name = FieldWireName;
00480                                         log_mother = log_CdcContainer;
00481                                         if ( i_line == 0 ) RelPhi = wireR2Phi - cell_dphi/2;
00482                                         else RelPhi = wireR2Phi;
00483                                         G4double dPhi;
00484                                         if ( layer_type == 2 ) dPhi = alpha_RMin;
00485                                         else if ( layer_type == 4 ) dPhi = -alpha_RMin;
00486                                         wire_pos_R = RMin*cos(alpha_RMin);
00487                                         theta = atan(RMin*sin(alpha_RMin)/layer_halfzlen);
00488                                         G4RotationMatrix* rotMatrix=new G4RotationMatrix();
00489                                         rotMatrix->rotateZ(-phi-RelPhi-dPhi);   
00490                                         rotMatrix->rotateX(theta);
00491                                         centerVec.setMag(wire_pos_R);
00492                                         centerVec.setTheta(pi/2);
00493                                         centerVec.setPhi(phi+RelPhi+dPhi);
00494                                         new G4PVPlacement(rotMatrix,centerVec,log_wire,name,log_mother,false,0,checkOverlap);
00495                                         //std::cout<<"Placing inner field wire of layer["<<layerId<<"], type["<<layer_type<<"]:"<<std::endl;
00496                                         //std::cout<<"  Rc = "<<wire_pos_R/mm<<", theta = "<<theta/rad<<std::endl;
00497                                 }
00498                         }
00499                 }
00500         }//end loop in layers
00501 }
00502 
00503 //=>Place Volumes
00504 G4VPhysicalVolume* CdcGeometrySvc::PlaceVolumes(){
00505         G4VPhysicalVolume* world_pvol = 0;
00506         G4VPhysicalVolume *former = SimpleGeometrySvc::PlaceVolumes();
00507         if (!world_pvol) world_pvol=former;
00508         return world_pvol;
00509 }
